page.title: 12MOTHER'S PRIDE BAKERY(P.2)
page.content: This machinery includes{ovens,fork {lift trucks,vehicles,computers}and{ {packing and wrapping facilities.}700 people are employed(630 men,70 women) The hours of work are normally 8 hour shifts,day,afternoon or night.The uniform is just a protective overall. The average wage is Â£100 per week. The products are mainly over{100 {varieties}of{bread}and{cobs.}The ingredients are{flour,yeast,salt,fat} and{water.}About{600 tons}of these ingredients are used each week and this makes about{1,000,000 loaves.}The products are sent by road within a 60 mile radius.There is a small amount of waste but this is sent to pig farms and is used for animal food.
